body:
I am trying very hard to get a bus error.

One way is misaligned access and I have tried the examples given [](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bus_error) and [](http://bytes.com/topic/c/answers/547755-misaligned-access-clarification), but no error for me -  the programs execute just fine.

Is there some situation which is sure to produce a bus error?
title: How to get a "bus error"?
